message:
2019-01-02

=====Material URLs=====

Video: https://edition.cnn.com/2018/12/06/cnn10/ten-content-fri/index.html

Transcript: http://transcripts.cnn.com/TRANSCRIPTS/1812/07/sn.01.html

*어제 컴퓨터가 고장이 나서 교재 메시지 전달이 늦어졌습니다. 죄송합니다.* 오늘은, 최첨단 주방에서의 IOT(Internet Of Things)의 활약을 볼 수 있습니다.

Today, you'll see Internet Of Things (IOT) in a state-of-the-art kitchen.

====Video Contents====

00:00 - 03:35
National Pearl Harbor Remembrance Day -- CNN 10 recalls the attack that led to the U.S. entry into World War II.

03:35 - 03:10
A kitchen where everything is connected, will the food actually be as good?
